mapper.select: select * from place where place_addr like #{place_addr} and place_name like #{place_name} limit 0,#{pageNum}

SELECT * FROM place p JOIN (select pt.time_val, pt.place_id,pt.time_id,r.res_time,r.res_team1,r.res_team2,r.res_type from place_time pt left join reservation r on pt.time_id=r.time_id and r.res_time=#{res_time} ) t ON p.place_id = t.place_id where p.place_id=#{place_id} order BY t.time_val;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (member_id, place_id, res_type, res_team1, res_team2, res_time, time_id, res_date, res_etc) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{place_id}, #{res_type}, #{res_team1}, #{res_team2}, #{res_time}, #{time_id}, NOW(), #{res_etc});
mapper.update: update reservation set member_id=concat(member_id,'/',#{member_id}), res_team1=res_team1+#{res_team1}, res_team2=res_team2+#{res_team2} where res_time=#{res_time} and time_id=#{time_id}
